comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Greetings from Java Moon Cafe in Sheridan, WY! We're Big Horn bound, [making up our route](http://maps.google.com/maps/ms?ie=UTF8&hl=en&msa=0&t=h&om=1&msid=106412931864288195098.000001134e915b21c7047&ll=43.13306,-111.22559&spn=7.550789,20.566406&z=6) as we go. Photos and tall tales to follow. Stay tuned.... -Your fearless leader (or self-deluded pal)

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I hope you have your fishing rod along. You're going to be in some prime fly fishing territory.
